description: This file defines the Express.js route handlers for the API endpoints, including a 'Hello World' endpoint and CRUD operations for employee records, with Swagger documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get('/hello')
methods.description: Handler for the '/hello' GET endpoint that responds with 'Hello World'.

methods.name: router.post('/employees')
methods.description: Handler to create a new employee record via employeesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/employees')
methods.description: Handler to list all employee records via employeesController.list.

methods.name: router.put('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler to replace an employee record via employeesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler to partially update an employee record via employeesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler to delete an employee record via employeesController.delete.
